name: Over the River (Typhos Games)
description:
In the dark of winter, the most hallowed of family traditions is observed: the long, difficult pilgrimage to Grandma and Grandpa's house. It's been a while since you and your sibling have gone to visit your grandparents, and there's something that's not quite right about them. Your mother is oblivious, and so you and your sibling must do what you can to make it out alive.

Over the River is a horror adventure for Trophy Dark inspired by uncomfortable holiday traditions, awkward dinners, and grandparents who don't treat you as human beings. 

Safety and Content Warnings

It is highly encouraged to play with safety tools at your table, especially for horror games. Information on available safety tools can be found at the TTRPG Safety Toolkit.

Content Warnings: Harm and danger to children (in the vein of a Brother's Grimm fairytale), alcoholism, cannibalism. 

Credits
